chapters.title: Chapter 5: Somethingâ€¦Strange
chapters.info: Bendhuin, p. 170—Scar-faced Aiel of the Green Salts sept of the Shaido Aiel. He is Fal Aldazar Din, a Brother to the Eagle. He is also the sept chief of the Green Salts Shaido. The Wise Ones sent him to Rhuidean to become the next chief of the Shaido.
